name: Barbarian
information: The strong embrace the wild that hides inside -keen instincts, primar physicality, and most of all, and unbridled, unquenchable rage

name: Bard
information: Bards know music is more than idle fancy -it ispower. Through study and adventure, these travelling troubadours master song, speech, and the magic within

name: Cleric
information: Clerics are representatives of the gods they worship, wielding potent divine magic for goods or ill

name: Druid
information: Druids channel the elemental forces of nature and share a deep kinship with animals with animals. Mastery of Wilds Shape allows them to transform into beasts from all over the Realms

name: Fighter
information: Fighters have mastered the art of combat, wielding weapons with unmatched skill and wearing armor like a second skin

name: Monk
information: Some reach enlightenment by languid meditatio n - others do so in the heat of battle. Monks manipulate ki to empower their own strikes and debilitate their foes

name: Paladin
information: A promise made so deeply that it becomes divine in itself flows through a paladin, burning bright enough to inspire allies and smite foes

name: Ranger
information: Rangers are unrivalled scouts and trackers honing a deep connection with nature in orer to hunt their favoured prey

name: Rogue
information: With stealth, skill, and uncanny reflexes, rogues` versatility lets them get the upper hand in almost any situation

name: Sorcerer
information: Sorcerers are natural spellcasters, drawing on inherent magic from a gift or bloodline

name: Warlock
information: Bound by a pact to an all-powerful patron, warlocks trade their loyalty for supernatural abilities and unique magic

name: Wizard
information: Wizards master the arcane by specialising and individual schools of magic, combining ancient spells with modern research
